jw300.name: JW300: A wide-coverage parallel corpus for low-resource languages
jw300.MLA: Agic, Željko, and Ivan Vulic. "JW300: A wide-coverage parallel corpus for low-resource languages." (2020).

gnome.name: GNOME (Opus)
gnome.info: A parallel corpus of GNOME localization files. Source: https://l10n.gnome.org

ubuntu.name: Ubuntu (Opus)
ubuntu.info: A parallel corpus of Ubuntu localization files. Source: https://translations.launchpad.net

kde4.name: KDE4 (Opus)
kde4.info: A parallel corpus of KDE4 localization files (v.2).

pmi-v1.name: PMIndia – A Collection of Parallel Corpora of Languages of India
pmi-v1.MLA: Haddow, Barry, and Faheem Kirefu. "PMIndia--A Collection of Parallel Corpora of Languages of India." arXiv preprint arXiv:2001.09907 (2020).

indo-wordnet-v0.2.name: IndoWordNet
indo-wordnet-v0.2.MLA: Bhattacharyya, Pushpak. "IndoWordNet." In Proc. of LREC-10. 2010.

indo-wordnet-sans-v0.2.name: IndoWordNet
indo-wordnet-sans-v0.2.MLA: Bhattacharyya, Pushpak. "IndoWordNet." In Proc. of LREC-10. 2010.

opus100.name: OPUS -- Parallel Corpora for Everyone
opus100.MLA: Tiedemann, Jörg. "OPUS–parallel corpora for everyone." Proceedings of the 19th Annual Conference of the European Association for Machine Translation: Projects/Products. 2016.

ted2020.name: Making monolingual sentence embeddings multilingual using knowledge distillation
ted2020.MLA: Reimers, Nils, and Iryna Gurevych. "Making monolingual sentence embeddings multilingual using knowledge distillation." arXiv preprint arXiv:2004.09813 (2020).

subtitles.name: OpenSubtitles2016: Extracting Large Parallel Corpora from Movie and TV Subtitles
subtitles.MLA: Lison, Pierre, and Jörg Tiedemann. "Opensubtitles2016: Extracting large parallel corpora from movie and tv subtitles." (2016): 923-929.

wikimatrix.name: Wikimatrix: Mining 135m parallel sentences in 1620 language pairs from wikipedia
wikimatrix.MLA: Schwenk, Holger, et al. "Wikimatrix: Mining 135m parallel sentences in 1620 language pairs from wikipedia." arXiv preprint arXiv:1907.05791 (2019).

tanzil.name: Tanzil (Opus)
tanzil.tnc:
Terms of Use 
The translations provided at this page are for non-commercial purposes only. If used otherwise, you need to obtain necessary permission from the translator or the publisher. 
 If you are using more than three of the following translations in a website or application, we require you to put a link back to this page to make sure that subsequent users have access to the latest updates.
tanzil.info: This is a collection of Quran translations compiled by the Tanzil project.

pib-v1.3.name: A Multilingual Parallel Corpora Collection Effort for Indian Languages
pib-v1.3.MLA: Siripragada, Shashank, et al. "A multilingual parallel corpora collection effort for Indian languages." arXiv preprint arXiv:2007.07691 (2020).

mkb-v0.name: A Multilingual Parallel Corpora Collection Effort for Indian Languages
mkb-v0.MLA: Siripragada, Shashank, et al. "A multilingual parallel corpora collection effort for Indian languages." arXiv preprint arXiv:2007.07691 (2020).

wiki-turk.name: Constructing Parallel Corpora for Six Indian Languages via Crowdsourcing
wiki-turk.MLA: Post, Matt, Chris Callison-Burch, and Miles Osborne. "Constructing parallel corpora for six indian languages via crowdsourcing." Proceedings of the Seventh Workshop on Statistical Machine Translation. 2012.

iitb.name: The IIT Bombay English-Hindi Parallel Corpus
iitb.MLA: Kunchukuttan, Anoop, Pratik Mehta, and Pushpak Bhattacharyya. "The iit bombay english-hindi parallel corpus." arXiv preprint arXiv:1710.02855 (2017).

odi-en-v2.0.name: OdiEnCorp 2.0: Odia-English Parallel Corpus for Machine Translation
odi-en-v2.0.MLA: Parida, Shantipriya, et al. "OdiEnCorp 2.0: Odia-English Parallel Corpus for Machine Translation." Proceedings of the WILDRE5–5th Workshop on Indian Language Data: Resources and Evaluation. 2020.

ufal-en-ta.name: cEnTam: Creation and Validation of a New English-Tamil Bilingual Corpus
ufal-en-ta.MLA: Sanjanasri, J. P., et al. "cEnTam: Creation and Validation of a New English-Tamil Bilingual Corpus." Proceedings of the 13th Workshop on Building and Using Comparable Corpora. 2020.

en-ur-charles.name: English-Urdu Religious Parallel Corpus
en-ur-charles.MLA:
Jawaid, Bushra and Zeman, Daniel, 2010, 
 English-Urdu Religious Parallel Corpus, LINDAT/CLARIAH-CZ digital library at the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics (ÚFAL), Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles University,
